pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 17, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 17, 2017:

Fredericton, New Brunswick

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Cultural Centre
28 Saunders Street
Fredericton, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Cultural Centre
28 Saunders Street
Fredericton, New Brunswick

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.


Saint John, New Brunswick

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Market Square Atrium.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Hampton, New Brunswick

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will stop by the Tim Horton’s in Hampton, New Brunswick.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Sherbrooke, Quebec

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Colonel Gaétan Côté Armoury  
64 Belvedere Street
Sherbrooke, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.


Please note that all times are local.
